Models.name: BPS C6-4
Models.description: BPS C6 with 4 output stackers (including one pre-defined currency adaptation)

Models.name: BPS C6-8
Models.description: BPS C6 with 8 output stackers (including one pre-defined currency adaptation)

Extension Module EX4.name: [BPSC6] Upgrade BPS C6-4 HW 2.0 to BPS C6-8 HW 2.0
Extension Module EX4.description: Upgrade of BPS C6-4 HW 2.0 to BPS C6-8 HW 2.0

Extension Module EX4.name: [BPSC6] Upgrade BPS C6-4 HW 3.0 to BPS C6-8 HW 3.0
Extension Module EX4.description: Upgrade of BPS C6-4 HW 3.0 to BPS C6-8 HW 3.0

Connection kit.name: [BPSC6] Connection kit HW 2.0
Connection kit.description: BPS C6-4 upgrade HW 1.0 to HW 2.0 for connecting Extension Modules HW 2.0

Connection kit.name: [BPSC6] Connection kit HW 3.0
Connection kit.description: BPS C6-4 upgrade HW 1.0 / HW 2.0 to HW 3.0 for connecting Extension Modules HW 3.0

Printer.name: [BPSC6] Printer - BIXOLON
Printer.description: 3 inch, 80mm, speed 300 mm/sec, USB 2.0 (BIXOLON), supports error handling, i.e. paper end or cover open

Barcode scanner.name: [BPSC6] Barcode scanner
Barcode scanner.description: Handheld scanner for barcodes on safebags

Currency adaptation.name: [BPSC6] Additional fee for Mixed currency processing up to 10 currencies
Currency adaptation.description: Additional fee for Mixed currency processing up to 10 currencies if the licenses are already ordered for processing in sequence

Currency adaptation.name: [BPSC6] Additional fee for Mixed currency processing > 10 currencies
Currency adaptation.description: Additional fee for Mixed currency processing > 10 currencies (max. 40 currencies) if the licenses are already ordered for processing in sequence

Interfaces.name: [BPSC6] Video surveillance interface and SNTP
Interfaces.description: XML report to connect the processing data of a particular deposit with the video stream of the surveillance supplier
